level3_description: Demonstrates thorough, accurate, and insightful understanding of key course concepts.
level2_description: Demonstrates solid understanding with minor omissions.
level1_description: Shows basic understanding but with notable gaps.

level3_description: Performs procedures accurately and efficiently with professional technique.
level2_description: Performs procedures correctly with minor errors.
level1_description: Performs procedures with errors; requires guidance.

level3_description: Applies concepts to solve complex, real-world problems effectively.
level2_description: Applies concepts to routine problems with success.
level1_description: Attempts application but with limited success.

level3_description: Consistently models safe, professional, and ethical behavior.
level2_description: Generally follows safety and professional norms.
